DataElement.preferredName: Organization Form Completed And Identifier Received Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indictor whether the organization patient form is completed and ID received as per study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Organization Form Completed And Identifier Received Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession.:A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing._To take, accept, or get something offered._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A formal group of people with one or more shared goals.

Concepts.definition: A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession.

Concepts.definition: A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
